comment: This lady  knows the material insideout. Great sense of humor. Well organized tests on what you learn. Enthusiastic about Latin  VERY contagious! Took 1001,1002,2001 with her. She makes the Roman and Greek Worlds come alive. If you love mythology, ancient History, and Culture, the class is for you! Gifted Professor. Makes Latin a favorite class!

Great professor. She knows her stuff and only looks in the book to make sure we can follow along. Will often go on about the myths and stories surrounding something come across in the book, but if you're into them it works out well. She also gives you more than enough chances to turn in work and extra credit.
Great professor, interesting stories. She really knows her stuff. If you decide to take Latin at KSU, I would definitely recommend her.
